service.name: resource-improver
service.description: Continuous improvement system for existing Vrooli resources using v2.0 contract validation and health monitoring patterns

claude-code.purpose: AI-powered resource improvement and v2.0 contract compliance

postgres.purpose: improvement history, v2.0 compliance tracking, and health monitoring data

redis.purpose: Cache improvement queue, validation results, and active improvement sessions

qdrant.purpose: Long-term memory for patterns, past improvements, and best practices

steps.name: generate-embeddings
steps.run: vrooli resource qdrant embeddings refresh --force || echo "Embeddings generation skipped (not critical)"
steps.description: Generate code embeddings for AI assistance

steps.name: initialize-database
steps.run: cd initialization && psql -h localhost -p ${RESOURCE_PORTS[postgres]} -U postgres -d postgres -f postgres/schema.sql || echo 'Database schema initialization completed'

steps.name: seed-database
steps.run: cd initialization && psql -h localhost -p ${RESOURCE_PORTS[postgres]} -U postgres -d postgres -f postgres/seed.sql || echo 'Database seed data loaded'
steps.description: Load improvement patterns and v2.0 contract templates

steps.name: check-claude-code
steps.run: resource-claude-code status >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo 'Claude Code not available - improvement features will be limited'
steps.description: Verify Claude Code availability for AI-powered improvements

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o resource-improver-api .

steps.name: show-urls
start-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: start-ui
steps.description: Start React UI in development mode

steps.name: show-running-services
